data.title: Water temperature in Tyumen in the Tour River now
data.meta_description: What is the current water temperature in Tyumen in the Tour River? How the water temperature will change in Tyumen in the coming days. Statistics for recent years.
data.text:
Russia > Tyumen region

Tyumen

Water temperature in the Tour River today

Tyumen, Russia | © rutraveller.ru

The most detailed information about the water temperature in Tyumen in the Tour River (Tyumen region, Russia). Forecast of changes in water temperature for the next 10 days. Statistics by months for recent years. Information about the neighboring resorts. Weather forecast in Tyumen for a week.

Water temperature in Tyumen right now

data updated 3 minutes ago

16.3°C

yesterday: 16.3°C

a week ago: 16.5°C

Trend: moderate drop

Today water temperature in Tyumen is 16.3°C. This is cool bathing water, but acceptable for short dives for physically fit and hardened people. Continuous exposure to such water for more than four hours can lead to severe hypothermia. In any case, the general weather is also important. So, the air temperature at the same time will reach 14°C.

Analysis and forecast

The water temperature today is significantly lower than the average on this day in recent years. Its value has rise over the last week, but has drop compared to 20 days ago. Exactly a year ago, on this day, the water temperature in this location was 20°C. Water temperature range in Tyumen in August is from 9 to 25 degrees.

According to our forecast, in the coming days, the water temperature in Tyumen will drop significantly enough and in 10 days it will be 13.6°C.

* Fact - Actual value of water temperature

** Average - Average water temperature on this day in past years

*** Forecast - Our forecast for the water temperature

Actual nearshore temperatures may vary by several degrees from the indicated values. This is noticeable after heavy rain or after prolonged periods of strong winds. Some downstream winds cause cold, deep waters to replace surface waters that have been warmed by the sun.

To develop a forecast, we use our own mathematical model, which takes into account the current change in water temperature, historical data and the main weather trends, wind strength and direction, air temperature in each specific region. We also take into account data for other resorts in Russia.

Ishim, Russia | © Дмитрий Лыткин

Annual graph of average water temperature change in Tyumen

Water temperature in Tyumen by month

Tyumen located in the northern hemisphere, at latitude 57 degrees. The comfortable water temperature for swimming is set here in June, almost always only at the end of the month. During a year in Tyumen there are 15 days of swimming. In general, the swimming season ends in August. Average annual water temperature on the coast in Tyumen is 8.5°C, by the seasons: in winter 3.0°C, in spring 7.4°C, in summer 16.9°C, in autumn 6.7°C. Minimum water temperature (2.3°C) in Tyumen it happens in October, maximum (22.3°C) in August.

You can find out detailed data on how the water temperature in Tyumen changes in each specific month:

The warmest water today in Russia recorded in Agoy, its value is 27.5°C. Lowest - in Mys Kamennyy, there water temperature now 2.1°C. Average water temperature in the country today - 19.7°C.

Water temperature data in Tyumen and neighboring towns and resorts collected from various sources, using buoys, using satellite maps of sea, river and lake surfaces of the NOAA agency.

We use data from various local authorities in each specific location of the world to more accurately reflect temperature values.

The nearest airport is located in a 13 kilometers. This is Roshchino International (TJM) airport. We have no information as to whether it is valid and what flights it receives or sends.

Find out the temperature of sea water in more than 12000 cities and resorts around the world. Water surface temperature values are available in real time. There is a forecast of water temperature changes for the next few days, as well as historical data of sea surface temperature are available for all days of the last years.

We use data from various sources, including National Centers for Environmental Information (NOAA), meteorological services of different countries, data received from more than a thousand buoys around the world, satellite systems for scanning the surface of the oceans and seas.
